Dottorato in Cybersecurity
item.description:
From: 27-06-2025 15:00
To: 26-08-2025 13:00
Category: Dottorati

Call for applications: Ita/Eng


PhD Program: Cybersecurity


Duration: 3 years


Official language of the PhD Programs: English.


Scholarships and grants:


  • 30 scholarships co-funded by IMT School, other Italian Universities and Research Centres, and Companies

Selection Process:  Academic qualifications and interview.


Detailed information is available in the call for applications.
